creator: bogofilter+apache.org@gmail.com
text:
When using the attrib task to set read-only attributes, Ant outputs only blank
lines (it doesn't even print "[attrib]").  It appears that you get one blank
line per file processed.  Here is my <attrib> task:

   <attrib file="${dist.dir}/**" readonly="true"/>

I would expect to get one of the lines of output I get when using -v:

   [attrib] Applied attrib to 15 files and 0 directories.

creator: peter.reilly@corvil.com
text:
the attrib task like the chmod task does not do dependence checking so
it does not only shows the action using the verbose log - otherwise
it would be too noisy.

the blank lines were I think the result of bug 27540, but I do
not have access to a windows machine to confirm this.

creator: bodewig@apache.org
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 27540 ***
